title: Elf Melter
summaries: The Elf Melter is a Hardmode, post-Plantera ranged weapon that can be considered an indirect post-Plantera upgrade to the Flamethrower, as it also uses Gel for ammunition. Similar to its predecessor, every press of the âš’ Use / Attack button consumes (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) 1 / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) 2 Gel and generates (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) five / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) six bursts of fire in quick succession that can be spread over an area by moving the cursor while firing. The Elf Melter is dropped from Santa-NK1 during the Frost Moon event with a 5.5% ~ 12.5% (12.5% ~ 50%) chance depending on the current wave.

On the <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop version</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console version</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile version</linked>, the Elf Melter's fire bursts possess unique blue graphics and fly out of the weapon at a high velocity while expanding with time, before disappearing a short distance ahead of the player, creating a cone-like area of effect. The fire has 15 <linked>armor penetration</linked>, inflicts the <linked>Frostbite</linked> debuff for 20 seconds, and can pierce through three enemies before dissipating upon hitting a fourth. Additionally, the flame projectile's damage decreases by 15% for each enemy it pierces.

On the <linked>[img:Old-gen console version]</linked><linked> Old-gen console version</linked> and <linked>Nintendo 3DS</linked><linked>[img:Nintendo 3DS version]</linked><linked> version</linked>, the Elf Melter's bursts are straight lines of fire particles, which travel out from the weapon to a short distance ahead of the player before stopping, lingering briefly. The fire inflicts the <linked>On Fire!</linked> debuff for 20 seconds and can pierce through three enemies before dissipating upon hitting a fourth.

Its best modifier is Unreal. A modifier granting +10% speed will increase the number of flame streams per click from six to seven (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) while still consuming 2 Gel. A modifier with added velocity will increase the range of each stream, i.e. by about 5 tiles for +15% and about 3 tiles for +10%.
